medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient first felt sharp right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain that radiated to his lower chest 4 days ago after eating steak. He also experienced nausea and vomiting at that time. He was pain-free until a few days later when the pain recurred and increased in severity. Over the past couple of days, he reported increased lethargy and was unable to walk. He has noted that his skin has yellowed over the last several days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dementia, CVA, CAD s/p MI, Atrial fibrillation, Valvular disease s/p replacement of tissue valve, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Diabetes Mellitus, Prostate cancer s/p prostatectomy, Gout s/p appendectomy, Bilateral hip arthroplasties.
medical_history.family_history: Mother: Died of 'old age'; Father: Died of 'old age'.
